lead_paragraph: David Beckham was left off the English team that will face Greece on Wednesday. Steve McClaren, England’s new coach, said, “At the present moment I am looking to take this team in a different direction.” He added that Beckham, 31, famous for his free kicks, could rejoin the team someday.
